auth_recover:
## Password updated!
Your Duffelbag account with name **{username}** has been updated to use password ||{password}||.
auth_new_short:
## Account successfully created!
Your shiny new Duffelbag account with name **{username}** has been created.
auth_new_long:
## Account successfully created!
Your shiny new Duffelbag account with name **{username}** has been created.

Any commands run on this discord account will automatically use this Duffelbag account. You can register other Discord accounts to this Duffelbag account using {slash_bind}. You'll need to remember your username and password for this. If you ever forget them, you can reset your password using `{slash_recover}`.
